TASK: Craft an item of type: bone_block
inventory=[{"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 17}, {"type": "farmland", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "spruce_trapdoor", "quantity": 55, "index": 36}, {"type": "stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a bone block, I need to place 9 bone meals in a 3x3 crafting grid. The first one goes into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1
